## Q1: Plot \\(h(x) \\; for \\; x \\in \[0,1\]\\).

Considering the function \$\$h(x) = \\big\[\\cos(4x)+\\tan(0.5x)\\big\]\^4\$\$

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| include: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(ggplot2)
myFunction <- function(x) {
  y <- (cos(4 * x) + tan(0.5 * x))^4
  return(y)
}
ggplot() +
  stat_function(
    fun = myFunction,
    xlim = c(0, 1),
    n = 1000
  ) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(
    x = "x",
    y = "h(x)"
  )

```
